1.title: Encouragement to Timothy
1.keyEvent: Paul urges Timothy to be strong in faith

2.title: Faithful Ministry Instructions
2.keyEvent: Paul instructs Timothy on faithful teaching and endurance

3.title: Warnings and Godliness
3.keyEvent: Paul warns of perilous times and describes godly conduct

4.title: Final Charge and Farewell
4.keyEvent: Paul charges Timothy to preach and shares personal farewell
